LanguageData.M4_SettingCatsCanHuntToolTip: Vanilla bugfix: Allows animals (like cats) to hunt smaller critters (like rats) again.
LanguageData.M4_SettingModifyAutoUndrafterToolTip: Various options for lengthening the time it takes for a colonist to undraft themselves.
LanguageData.M4_SettingWithGunsBlazing: Stay drafted when there's gunfire on the map.
LanguageData.M4_SettingGunsBlazingToolTip: Pawns stay drafted as long as someone is firing a gun on the map.
LanguageData.M4_SettingExtendUndraftTimeBy: Extend the time to undraft by:
LanguageData.M4_SettingExtendUndraftTimeByToolTip: The vanilla value is 5000 ticks, a little under a RimWorld hour. This setting *adds* to the 5000 ticks. Note that colonists actively engaged in combat will not undraft themselves (under normal circumstances).
LanguageData.M4_SettingLowMoodUndraftDesc: Allow the regular AutoUndrafter to kick in when colonists are at low mood.
LanguageData.M4_SettingLargePackToolTip: By default, RimWorld stops sending manhunter packs at high raid points. This changes that.
LanguageData.M4_SettingVariableRaidRetreat: Change the threshold at which raids flee
LanguageData.M4_SettingVariableRaidToolTip: By default, raiders give up at 50% losses. This allows you to change it. Does not apply to mechanoids and other factions which don't flee.
LanguageData.M4_SettingRandomRaidRetreatToolTip: Raiders will flee somewhere between {0} and {1} losses.
LanguageData.M4_SettingRetreatAtPercentageDefeated: Flee when this many raiders have died:
LanguageData.M4_SettingDontLeaveJustYet: Lengthen the time on caravan maps
LanguageData.M4_SettingDontLeaveJustYetToolTip: NOTE: Does not apply to existing caravan maps and changes to these settings are not applied until you restart the game.
LanguageData.M4_HarvestYieldThingDetailInit: What this plant yields when harvested by a colonist. Information about {0} is as follows...
LanguageData.M4_TutorialStyleRollingDesc: If this is enabled, non-violents will be removed from the available colonist pool during the starting screen. That means you'll never roll Emmie the Sex Slave, or Roughchild the Reporter
LanguageData.M4_NotifyDeadAnimals: Tell me about every dead colony animal!
LanguageData.M4_NotifyDeadAnimalsDesc: When disabled, this removes the Death notification message for colony animals. This includes bonded animals.
LanguageData.M4_LessLitterLoutingToolTip: How much filth and trash a human produces per 1000 cells. Default value is 5.
